channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The FTC makes it easier to cancel subscriptions like gym memberships
item.description: Soon, it’ll be easier to end recurring subscriptions and memberships — if the FTC has its way. Today, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission announced a fi...

item.title: 8 Best Chromebooks of 2024, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Choosing the right Chromebook for your needs can be a tough decision. We can help with our favorite picks.

item.title: Best Gifts For Hikers, Backpackers, Outdoorsy People (2024)
item.description: Let them pick out their own hiking boots. Instead, try gifting a useful app or a nature journal to delight your outdoorsy friend.

item.title: NASA Will Do Space in Style With the Prada Axiom Spacesuit
item.description: In Milan, the fashion house and Axiom Space have revealed how astronauts will be decked out on the lunar surface during the Artemis 3 mission in 2026.

item.title: How Paladin’s drones helped Asheville during Hurricane Helene
item.description: When Hurricane Helene hit Asheville, North Carolina in September, the city’s police department reached out to public safety drone startup Paladin for ...

item.title: Boston Dynamics teams with TRI to bring AI smarts to Atlas humanoid robot

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Plus Review: Light and Thin
item.description: This powerful clamshell Chromebook packs an AMOLED screen and is one of the first with the new Quick Insert key.

item.title: Google will now help you find the cheapest flights available for your trip
item.description: Google is introducing a new feature that will help you find the cheapest flights for your next trip. The company announced on Wednesday that it’s addi...

item.title: 8 Best Smart Shades, Blinds, and Curtains (2024)
item.description: From made-to-measure smart shades to retrofit curtain bots, these are our favorite WIRED-tested drapes for your windows.

item.title: Glovo adds a side of social stickiness to its food delivery app
